text:
The Alagappa University has announced results of the Distance Education Examinations held in December 2015 for the Under Graduate, Post Graduate, MBA and PG Diploma courses and hosted the results on the university website www.alagappa university.ac.in.

Students could apply for revaluation of answer scripts in the format, which can be downloaded from the university website, H Gurumallesh Prabu, Controller of Examinations said in a press release here on Friday. The duly filled in application for revaluation along with a demand draft for Rs.500 per subject, favouring the Registrar, Alagappa University payable at Karaikudi, should reach the Controller of Examinations on or before March 14, he said.
title: Results published
